headline: Ask HN: Ukrainians who were working in the IT sector, how are you?
description:
How are you all doing? Will any of you come to the US under the refugee program?

Before the war [1], 4% of GDP, employed 200k people.

but for many in the country’s bustling tech hubs of Kyiv, Lviv, Kharkiv and Dnipro business has been better than ever. The country’s rapidly growing IT industry saw exports grow by 20.4 percent in 2020 crossing $5 billion for the first time, according to figures from the National Bank of Ukraine.

[1] https://www.bbc.com/storyworks/future/ukraine-innovating-for-the-future/ukraines-dynamic-it-sector
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 在IT领域工作的乌克兰人，你们怎么样了？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 在IT領域工作的烏克蘭人，你們怎麼樣了？
description_zh-Hans:
你们都好吗？Will any of you come to the US under the refugee program?

Before the war [1], 4% of GDP, employed 200k people.

but for many in the country’s bustling tech hubs of Kyiv, Lviv, Kharkiv and Dnipro business has been better than ever. 根据乌克兰国家银行的数字，该国快速增长的IT行业在2020年的出口增长了20.4%，首次超过50亿美元。

[1] https://www.bbc.com/storyworks/future/ukraine-innovating-for-the-future/ukraines-dynamic-it-sector
description_zh-Hant:
你們都好嗎？Will any of you come to the US under the refugee program?

Before the war [1], 4% of GDP, employed 200k people.

but for many in the country’s bustling tech hubs of Kyiv, Lviv, Kharkiv and Dnipro business has been better than ever. 根據烏克蘭國家銀行的數字，該國快速增長的IT行業在2020年的出口增長了20.4%，首次超過50億美元。

[1] https://www.bbc.com/storyworks/future/ukraine-innovating-for-the-future/ukraines-dynamic-it-sector
